flavor.reason: The flavor of the dishes received mixed reviews, with some diners praising the specialty rolls while others found the sushi bland or overly reliant on rice.

freshness.reason: Freshness was inconsistent, with some diners reporting fresh fish while others noted issues with quality and even experiencing discomfort after meals.

service.reason: Service was inconsistent, with reports of slow service, incorrect orders, and unprofessional behavior from staff.

environment.reason: The ambiance was generally appreciated, but concerns about cleanliness and odd music choices were noted.

value.reason: The AYCE sushi option was seen as a good deal by many, though some felt the quality did not justify the price.
